excerpt: "Last month, a New York Times report shed light on Clearview AI, a startup that created a facial recognition app by scraping public-facing photos off social media. It built up a massive database of photos, and was sharing it with law enforcement. Backlash almost immediately began pouring out. Just a few days later, the backlash hit the courts."
